sense.def:
A strap
je ozek kos usnja ali tkanine, s katerim nosimo predmete ali jih vežemo skupaj.

seg.quote: I undid the straps, and opened the case.
...high-heeled shoes, with straps above the ankle.

sense.def:
To strap something somewhere
pomeni nekaj nekam pritrditi z jermenom.

seg.quote: Children should be strapped into a special car seat.
